entry.data:
SHOWERS, BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S THIS AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 15 TO 20 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 50
